Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar stand
Description: Asymmetrical jar stand. The lower rim is flared and has a triangular lip, the upper rim ends with a convex lip. The object was wheel-thrown, polished except on the inside of the base where cutting marks are still quite visible. The exterior surface and the upper lip were entirely covered with a very light red wash.
